import React, { Component } from 'react' import {FaStar} from 'react-icons/fa' import '../ratings.css' export class Ratings extends Component { state = { loading: true, ratings: [] }; async componentDidMount(){ const url = "http://substyleprod.com/projects/APIS/ratings.json"; const response = await fetch(url); const data = await response.json(); const parseData = userData(data); console.log(data[0].name) this.setState({ratings: data, loading: false}) let rateSum = 0; let numRatings = 0; const len = data.length; let item = null; for (let i = 0; i < len; i++) { item = data[i]; if (item.found) { rateSum = item.rating + rateSum; numRatings = numRatings + 1; } } const avgRate = rateSum / numRatings; console.log("Average rate:", avgRate); } render() { if (this.state.loading) { return
...loading reviews...please wait....
} if(!this.state.ratings.length) { return
No one's commenting! Be the first!
} return (

))}
) } } export default Ratings
